titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a health insurance Federal Invisible Risk Sharing Program.
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a health insurance Federal Invisible Risk Sharing Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to administer a Federal Invisible Risk Sharing Program that pays health insurers for claims by eligible individuals in order to lower health insurance premiums in the individual market.
